title: 8 orange essence
body: Please Riot I beg you,give me 8 orange essence,I dissenchanted a skin and im missing 8 oe. {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Unlike small amounts of Gift RP for a drawing or something, Essence isn't something we can gift out unfortunately. Mainly it's because essence is a currency that you can earn over time, even if it can take awhile to finally get how much you need sometimes. Luckily you should only need to disenchant one skin shard for that 8 more!
